content: **materials ** single size j & p coats knit-cro-sheen 46 balls of white or ecru or 74 balls of any color double size j & p coats knit-cro-sheen 57 balls of white or ecru or 90 balls of any color milward s steel crochet hook no 7 **gauge ** each block measures about 5 inches square before blocking for a single size spread about 72 x 108 inches including fringe make 13 x 20 blocks for a double size spread about 90 x 108 inches including fringe make 16 x 20 blocks
